# unifi_sites (Data Source)

Fetches the list of UniFi sites.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List all UniFi sites
data "unifi_sites" "all" {}

output "sites" {
  value = data.unifi_sites.all.sites
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `sites` (Attributes List) List of UniFi sites. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sites))

<a id="nestedatt--sites"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sites`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the site.
- `internal_reference` (String) The internal reference of the site.
- `name` (String) The name of the site.
